ai.grakn.engine.tasks

Interface TaskManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiQueueTaskManager, SingleQueueTaskManager, StandaloneTaskManager

    public interface TaskManager
extends AutoCloseable

    The base TaskManager interface.

    Provides common methods for scheduling tasks for execution and stopping task execution.

    Author:
    Denis Lobanov, alexandraorth

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTask(TaskState taskState)
      Schedule a single shot/one off BackgroundTask to run after a @delay in milliseconds.
      default TaskStateStorage chooseStorage(GraknEngineConfig properties, ZookeeperConnection zookeeper) 
      void stopTask(TaskId id)
      Stop a Scheduled, Paused or Running task.
      TaskStateStorage storage()
      Return the StateStorage instance that is used by this class.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • addTask

        void addTask(TaskState taskState)
        Schedule a single shot/one off BackgroundTask to run after a @delay in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        taskState - Task to execute

      • stopTask

        void stopTask(TaskId id)
        Stop a Scheduled, Paused or Running task. Task's .stop() method will be called to perform any cleanup and the task is killed afterwards.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of task to stop.

      • storage

        TaskStateStorage storage()
        Return the StateStorage instance that is used by this class.
        Returns:
        A StateStorage instance.

      • chooseStorage

        default TaskStateStorage chooseStorage(GraknEngineConfig properties,
                                       ZookeeperConnection zookeeper)
